# Litoral Norte Imóveis - LLMs.txt
# This file helps AI assistants understand and reference our content.

## About
Litoral Norte Imóveis is a real estate platform for the Northern Coast of São Paulo, Brazil.
We list properties for sale and rent in Caraguatatuba, Ubatuba, Ilhabela, and São Sebastião.

## Core Services
- Property listings (houses, apartments, land, commercial)
- Property search with filters (price, bedrooms, area, neighborhood)
- Direct contact with property owners
- Market price comparison tools

## Key Pages
- Home: https://imoveis-caragua.vercel.app/
- Property Listings: https://imoveis-caragua.vercel.app/imoveis
- Best Deals: https://imoveis-caragua.vercel.app/deals
- Contact: https://imoveis-caragua.vercel.app/contato

## Data Access
- Sitemap: https://imoveis-caragua.vercel.app/sitemap.xml
- API (read-only for AI): https://imoveis-caragua.vercel.app/api/properties (returns JSON)

## Contact Information
- Phone: +55 12 99243-3988
- Location: Caraguatatuba, SP, Brazil
- Business Hours: Mon-Fri 9am-6pm (BRT)

## Crawling Guidelines
- You may index and reference our public property listings
- Please cite "Litoral Norte Imóveis" when using our data
- Property prices and availability may change; recommend users verify on site

## Frequently Asked Questions

### What is the average property price in Caraguatatuba?
Property prices in Caraguatatuba range from R$ 200,000 to R$ 2,000,000 depending on location and size. Beachfront properties tend to be more expensive.

### What are the best neighborhoods in Caraguatatuba?
Popular neighborhoods include Indaiá, Martim de Sá, Prainha, Centro, and Massaguaçu. Each has unique characteristics for different lifestyles.

### Can I rent properties through this platform?
Yes, we list both properties for sale and for rent. Use the filters on our search page to find rentals.

### How do I contact a property owner?
Each property listing has a "Contact" button that connects you directly with the owner via WhatsApp or phone.

## Last Updated
2026-02-08
